Package be.ac.umons.jsonschematools

Class JSONSchemaStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.umons.jsonschematools.JSONSchemaStore
  • public class JSONSchemaStore
extends Object
    Stores the schemas used so far. This implementation does not support downloading schemas from the Internet. Every schema must be present locally.
    Author:
    GaÃ«tan Staquet

        ignoreTrueAdditionalProperties - If true, schemas will discard "additionalProperties" if the value is true.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public JSONSchema load​(URI path)
                throws FileNotFoundException,
                       JSONSchemaException
        Loads a JSON schema from a file stored in the computer's filesystem. This implementation does not support downloading documents from the Internet. Every schema must be locally available.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the file
        Returns:
        The schema
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        JSONSchemaException

      • loadFromJSONObject

                              throws JSONSchemaException
        Loads a JSON schema directly from a JSON object
        Parameters:
        schemaObject - The JSON document
        Returns:
        The schema
        Throws:
        JSONSchemaException
